forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. SE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. SE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
